### Load packages and data

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(lfe)
library(AER)
library(ggnewscale)
library(cowplot)
library(stargazer)
library(sandwich)
library(readstata13)
library(rdrobust)
source(paste(rootdir, "/code/rdrobustr.r", sep = "")) ### rdrobust package with some minor adjustments
library(RDHonest)
#devtools::install_github("mdgordo/dumbells",ref="master")
library(dumbells)
library(rdpower)
library(hdm)
library(boot)
library(parallel)
source(paste(rootdir, "/code/rdhelpers.r", sep = ""))

df.hh <- read_csv(paste(rootdir, "/data/processed/full_panel.csv", sep = ""), guess_max = 7500)

### divide all cash vars by 1000 - also drop hhs very far from border, otherwise pick up hhs on the other side 
df.hh <- filter(df.hh, food_consumption>0, total_income>0,
                abs(dist_2_seg1pt)<150) %>%
  mutate(wave2 = if_else(wave==2, 1, 0),
         wave3 = if_else(wave==3, 1, 0),
         migration_bin = if_else(n_migrants > 0, 1, 0)) %>%
  group_by(hhid) %>%
  mutate(lag_h = lag(home_value, order_by = wave))
```

Define vars

```{r, warning = FALSE}
placebos <- c("shake_pga", "high_caste", "age_hh", "highest_ed", "hhmembers",
              "class5", "class10", "always_lived_house", "always_lived_dist", "slope", "NGO_transfers", "non_quake_aid")
infravars <- c("time_to_school", "time_to_health", "time_to_market", "time_to_bank")
pricevars <- c("chicken_price", "rice_price", "lentil_price", "sugar_price", "mutton_price")
aidvars <- c("aid_cumulative_bin", "aid_cumulative", "reconstruction_aid_bin", "reconstruction_aid_cumulative")
mainvars <- c("food_consumption", "home_investment", "remittance_income", "liq_savings", "tot_savings", "total_income", "migration_bin")
secvars <- c("labor_income", "livestock_value", "business_investment", "cap_inputs", "school_costs", "health_costs",
             "work_aid_wages", "liq_savings", "tot_savings", "labor_supply", "days_ill")

### regression specs - note difference between aid definitions in structural and RD sections
dist.exclude = c("none", "slight"); k = "triangular"; vce = "hc1"
bvar = "dist_2_seg1pt"; fvar = "aid_cumulative_bin"
ctrls <- c("shake_pga", "high_caste", "gorkha_loss_ever", "time_to_health", "time_to_market", "slope")

ctrls1 <- pdlvarselect("food_consumption", df = df.hh, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, fuzzy = fvar)
ctrls1

### first stage bandwidth
bw <- optbw(fvar, bvar, df.hh, fuzzy = FALSE, k, TRUE, 0, vce, dist.exclude, ctrls, FALSE)
h0 <- bw[1,3]; h0 
```

### regressions

First stage

```{r, warnings=FALSE}
bws <- optbw(aidvars[1], b = bvar, df = df.hh, fuzzy = FALSE, vars = ctrls1, 
             dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, ihs = FALSE)
h1 <- bws[1,1]
b1 <- bws[1,3]
saveRDS(b1, paste(rootdir, "/data/model_output/optbw.rds", sep = ""))

rdstg11 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = ctrls1, 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce)

rdstg12 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = ctrls1, 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = "epanechnikov", vce = vce)

rdstg13 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh,
                h = h1*.75, b0 = b1*.75, vars = ctrls1, 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce)

rdstg14 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = ctrls1, 
                h = h1*2, b0 = b1*2, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce)

rdstg15 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = ctrls1, 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, donut = 5)

rdstg16 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = ctrls, 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce)

rdstg17 <- lapply(aidvars[1:2], regout, b = bvar, df = df.hh, vars = "none", 
                 dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce)

rdstg1 <- c(rdstg11, rdstg12, rdstg13, rdstg14, rdstg15, rdstg16, rdstg17)

rdgazer(rdstg1[c(1:8)], dvlabs = rep(c("Received Aid", "Aid Amount"), 4), type = "text", 
        xlines = list(c("Kernel", rep("triangular", 2),  rep("epanechnikov", 2), rep("triangular", 4)),
                      c("5 km Donut", rep("", 8)),
                      c("Controls", rep("Opt", 8)),
                      c("Wards", sapply(rdstg1, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))))

rdgazer(rdstg1[c(9:14)],dvlabs = rep(c("Received Aid", "Aid Amount"), 3), type = "text", 
        xlines = list(c("Kernel", rep("triangular", 6)),
                      c("5 km Donut", rep("X", 2), rep("", 4)),
                      c("Controls", rep("Opt", 2), rep("Alt", 2), rep("", 2)),
                      c("Wards", sapply(rdstg1, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))))

```

## Quantile Regression

Plots

Food Consumption - 100,000 is about $2.7/day, close to the median

```{r, warning = FALSE}
df <- dfprep(df.hh, "food_consumption", 0, "dist_2_seg1pt", dist.exclude)
cvarscutpts <- quantile(df$food_consumption, seq(.1, .9, .1), na.rm = TRUE)
ctlist <- lapply(cvarscutpts, cutvars, var = "food_consumption", df)
df <- cbind(df, data.frame(do.call(cbind, ctlist)))
bws <- optbw("food_consumption", b = "dist_2_seg1pt", df = df.hh, fuzzy = "reconstruction_aid_bin", vars = "none", 
             dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, ihs = FALSE)
h0 <- bws[1,1]
b0 <- bws[1,3]

cvarst <- paste("t", cvarscutpts, sep = "")
cvarsu <- paste("u", cvarscutpts, sep = "")
cvarsc <- paste("c", cvarscutpts, sep = "")

rdc <- lapply(cvarst, regout, b = "dist_2_seg1pt", df = df, fuzzy = "reconstruction_aid_bin", vars = "none", h = h0, b0 = b0, 
              k = k, vce = vce, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, ihs = FALSE)
rdgazer(rdc, dvlabs = paste("<", round(cvarscutpts,0), "k npr", sep = ""), 
        xlines = list(c("Wards", sapply(rdc, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))), type = "text")

rdcu <- lapply(cvarsu, regout, b = "dist_2_seg1pt", df = df, fuzzy = "inv", vars = "none", h = h0, b0 = b0, 
               k = k, vce = vce, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, ihs = FALSE)
rdgazer(rdcu, dvlabs = paste("<", round(cvarscutpts,0), "k npr", sep = ""), 
        xlines = list(c("Wards", sapply(rdcu, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))), type = "text")

rdcc <- lapply(cvarsc, regout, b = "dist_2_seg1pt", df = df, fuzzy = "reconstruction_aid_bin", vars = "none", h = h0, b0 = b0, 
               k = k, vce = vce, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, ihs = FALSE)
rdgazer(rdcc, dvlabs = paste("<", round(cvarscutpts,0), "k npr", sep = ""), 
        xlines = list(c("Wards", sapply(rdcc, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))), type = "text")

foodt <- unlist(lapply(rdc, function(x) x$Estimate[1]))
foodu <- unlist(lapply(rdcu, function(x) x$Estimate[1]))
foodRD <- list(foodt, foodu, cvarscutpts)
saveRDS(foodRD, paste(rootdir, "/data/model_output/foodRD.rds", sep = ""))
```

severe <- st_union(filter(df.shp, designation == "severe"))
